DataElement.preferredName: Medical Oncology First Other Treatment Preference Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term not previously mentioned that represents the kind of first other treatment preference with medical oncology.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Oncology First Other Therapeutic Procedure Preference
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The study and treatment of cancers with chemicals, biological products or immunotherapy._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The study and treatment of cancers with chemicals, biological products or immunotherapy.

Concepts.definition: The study and treatment of cancers with chemicals, biological products or immunotherapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
